name: Bramble
description: The Bramble is a spring cocktail created by Dick Bradsell in 1980s London, England. Bradsell suggests finishing off the cocktail with some fresh red fruits and a slice of lemon.

ingredients.ingredient: Garnish – slice of lemon and a blackberry

directions: Shake the gin, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a cocktail shaker with a good handful of ice cubes.
Then strain into a rocks glass full of crushed ice.
Drizzle the crème de mure over the top so it ‘bleeds’ into the drink.
Garnish with the lemon slice and blackberry.
